messages: 0a8cf71fd58b16e482517f936c971d3a (11:10): Hi, imagine a category tree structure and you are to select a category for your article, how would you do that? <select> with nested <optgroup>s seems to be an interesting idea but you cannot select XYZ category marked up with label="XYZ category" because it is, well, a label.
